addr: 16055 Ventura Blvd. 4th Floor Conference Room. Los Angeles, CA 91436
title: Supervision in Private Practice: Legal and Ethical Issues
desc: This course fulfills 6 hours of mandatory Law and Ethics CEUs and 6 hours of supervision CEUs required by the Board of Behavioral Science ?to supervise MFT interns, Associate Clinical Social Workers, and LPCC interns. Complete them all at once! The content of this course is apppropriate for beginning to advanced supervisors. The course will cover: BBS supervision and paperwork requirements Selecting private practice interns The structure of supervision Legal and ethical issues pertaining to private practice supervision California employment laws Supervision theory in private practice Course attendees will be assessed on these areas at the completion of instruction. Successful completion required for CEUs. Board of Behavioral Sciences Continuing Education Provider #5207
